links.title: Press Releases
links.content:
[ ![Imperial Petroleum](/templates/rt_akuatik/custom/images/stealthpetroleum-logo_text.png) ](/)

##  [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. ANNOUNCES THE DATE FOR THE RELEASE OF THIRD QUARTER AND NINE MONTHS 2024 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS, CONFERENCE CALL AND WEBCAST. ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/114-imperial-petroleum-inc-announces-the-date-for-the-release-of-third-quarter-and-nine-months-2024-financial-and-operating-results-conference-call-and-webcast)

**ATHENS, GREECE November 27, 2024**. Imperial Petroleum Inc. is a ship-owning company providing petroleum products, crude oil and drybulk seaborne transportation services, announced today that it will release its third quarter and nine months financial results for the period ended September 30, 2024 before the market opens in New York on December 2, 2024.

On December 2, 2024 at 10:00 am ET, the company’s management will host a conference call to discuss the results and the company’s operations and outlook.

[ Read more ... ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/114-imperial-petroleum-inc-announces-the-date-for-the-release-of-third-quarter-and-nine-months-2024-financial-and-operating-results-conference-call-and-webcast)

##  [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. DECLARES DIVIDEND ON SERIES A PREFERRED SHARES ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/113-imperial-petroleum-inc-declares-dividend-on-series-a-preferred-shares-5)

Athens, Greece, September 15, 2024 – Imperial Petroleum Inc. (Nasdaq: IMPP) (the “Company”), a ship-owning company providing petroleum products, crude oil, and drybulk seaborne transportation services, today announced a dividend of $0.546875 per share on its 8.75% Series A Cumulative Redeemable Perpetual Preferred Stock (the “Series A Preferred Shares”), payable on September 30, 2024 to holders of record as of September 25, 2024. The dividend payment relates to the period from the last dividend payment date for the Series A Preferred Shares on June 30, 2024 through September 29, 2024.

There are 795,878 Series A Preferred Shares outstanding as of the date hereof. The Series A Preferred Shares trade on the Nasdaq Capital Market under the ticker symbol “IMPPP”.

[ Read more ... ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/113-imperial-petroleum-inc-declares-dividend-on-series-a-preferred-shares-5)

##  [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. REPORTS FIRST QUARTER 2024 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/111-imperial-petroleum-inc-reports-first-quarter-2024-financial-and-operating-results)

**ATHENS, GREECE, May 16, 2024 - IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. (NASDAQ: IMPP, the “Company”),** a ship-owning company providing petroleum products, crude oil and dry bulk seaborne transportation services, announced today its unaudited financial and operating results for the three months ended March 31, 2024.

**OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL HIGHLIGHTS**

  * Fleet operational utilization of 80.6% in Q1 24’ an improved performance compared to Q4 23’ mainly due to a 29.3% (65 days) decrease in commercial idle days. In Q1 23’our operational utilization was 85.0%.
  * 0% of fleet calendar days, equivalent to 671 days, in Q1 24’ were dedicated to spot activity.
  * Revenues of $41.2 million in Q1 24’ compared to $29.9 million in Q4 23’ equivalent to a 37.8% rise- and $65.4 million of revenues in Q1 23’.
  * Net Income of $16.7 million in Q1 24’ compared to net income of $6.5 million in Q4 23’ equivalent to a 157% increase- and net income of $35.7 million in Q1 23’.
  * Cash and cash equivalents and time deposits of $67.0 million as of March 31, 2024.
  * On April 17, 2024, we agreed to sell our 2009 built aframax tanker Gstaad Grace II for $42 million. The vessel was delivered to its new owners on April 26, 2024.



[ Read more ... ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/111-imperial-petroleum-inc-reports-first-quarter-2024-financial-and-operating-results)

##  [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. REPORTS SECOND QUARTER AND SIX MONTHS 2024 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/112-imperial-petroleum-inc-reports-second-quarter-and-six-months-2024-financial-and-operating-results)

ATHENS, GREECE, August 27, 2024 - IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. (NASDAQ: IMPP, the “Company”), a ship-owning company providing petroleum products, crude oil and dry bulk seaborne transportation services, announced today its unaudited financial and operating results for the second quarter and six months ended June 30, 2024.

**OPERATIONAL AND FINANCIAL HIGHLIGHTS**

  * Fleet operational utilization of 80.9% in Q2 24’- a stable performance when compared to the 80.6% utilization achieved in Q1 24’. In Q2 23’ our operational utilization was lower in the order of 75.4%.
  * 5% of fleet calendar days equivalent to 744 days in Q2 24’ were dedicated to spot activity.
  * Delivery from an affiliated entity of the handysize drybulk carrier, the Neptulus (2012 built), on August 24, 2024
  * Revenues of $47.0 million in Q2 24’ compared to $41.2 million in Q1 24’ equivalent to a 14.1% rise- and $59.0 million of revenues in Q2 23’.
  * Net income of $19.5 million in Q2 24’- our second best performance thus far- up by $2.8 million when compared to Q1 24’ and $2.7 million when compared to Q2 23’.
  * Cash and cash equivalents including time deposits of $129.8 million as of June 30, 2024.
  * Receipt of $39 million due from C3is Inc on July 15th 2024, an amount owed from the sale of the aframax tanker Afrapearl II, thus enabling our current cash balance to climb at almost $190 million.
  * An aggregate of 4.3 common shares were issued upon the exercise of Class E Warrants in the second quarter and the third quarter to date.



[ Read more ... ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/112-imperial-petroleum-inc-reports-second-quarter-and-six-months-2024-financial-and-operating-results)

##  [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. ANNOUNCES THE DATE FOR THE RELEASE OF FIRST QUARTER 2024 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS, CONFERENCE CALL AND WEBCAST. ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/110-imperial-petroleum-inc-announces-the-date-for-the-release-of-first-quarter-2024-financial-and-operating-results-conference-call-and-webcast)

**ATHENS, GREECE May 14, 2024**. Imperial Petroleum Inc. is a ship-owning company providing petroleum products, crude oil and drybulk seaborne transportation services, announced today that it will release its first quarter financial results for the period ended March 31, 2024 before the market opens in New York on May 16, 2024.

On May 16, 2024 at 09:00 am ET, the company’s management will host a conference call to discuss the results and the company’s operations and outlook.

[ Read more ... ](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/110-imperial-petroleum-inc-announces-the-date-for-the-release-of-first-quarter-2024-financial-and-operating-results-conference-call-and-webcast)

  1. [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. DECLARES DIVIDEND ON SERIES A PREFERRED SHARES](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/109-imperial-petroleum-inc-declares-dividend-on-series-a-preferred-shares-4)

  3. [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. ANNOUNCES THE DATE FOR THE RELEASE OF FOURTH QUARTER AND TWELVE MONTHS 2023 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS, CONFERENCE CALL AND WEBCAST.](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/106-imperial-petroleum-inc-announces-the-date-for-the-release-of-fourth-quarter-and-twelve-months-2023-financial-and-operating-results-conference-call-and-webcast)
  4. [ IMPERIAL PETROLEUM INC. ANNOUNCES CONVERSION OF OUTSTANDING SERIES C CONVERTIBLE PREFERRED STOCK](/index.php/investor-relations/press-releases/105-imperial-petroleum-inc-announces-conversion-of-outstanding-series-c-convertible-preferred-stock)

links.title: Webcasts and presentations
links.content:
[ ![Imperial Petroleum](/templates/rt_akuatik/custom/images/stealthpetroleum-logo_text.png) ](/)

[**IMPERIAL PETROLEUM Inc.**](https://edge.media-server.com/mmc/p/sr5jr6fc)

[**2nd Quarter 2024 Results** _The webcast is scheduled for:__Tuesday, August 27 , 2024,_](https://edge.media-server.com/mmc/p/sr5jr6fc)

[_3:00 pm CET / 9:00 am EDT_](https://edge.media-server.com/mmc/p/sr5jr6fc)

[](/images/IMPPQ12024.pdf)[**Download Presentation**](/images/IMPPQ224.pdf)

****Webcast URL****

**<https://edge.media-server.com/mmc/p/9hhik9s4>**

Beginning this quarter, conference call participants should **pre-register** using [this link](https://register.vevent.com/register/BI4888ca9812574a5fb23bfdfa933b77d6) to receive the dial-in numbers and a personal PIN, which are required to access the conference call.

**Online Registration**

**[](https://register.vevent.com/register/BI4888ca9812574a5fb23bfdfa933b77d6)**<https://register.vevent.com/register/BI4888ca9812574a5fb23bfdfa933b77d6>[](https://protect2.fireeye.com/v1/url?k=31323334-501d5122-31352c29-454445555731-408a41a0664709c5&q=1&e=92f51947-0e02-4072-95fc-40069e357a29&u=https%3A%2F%2Fregister.vevent.com%2Fregister%2FBI52fe1de4b58b412dada1845a63e07141)****

  1. Click on the call link and complete the online registration form.
  2. Upon registering you will receive the dial-in info and a unique PIN to join the call as well as an email confirmation with the details.
  3. Select a method for joining the call;


    1. Dial-In: A dial in number and unique PIN are displayed to connect directly from your phone.
    2. Call Me: Enter your phone number and click “Call Me” for an immediate callback from the system. The call will come from a US number.



© 2024 All rights reserved. Designed & Developed by [Imperial Petroleum](/).
